availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John T. Pratt (Greenup County, Kentucky, day laborer)

body.p: Greenup County, Kentucky, day laborer. Kentucky native. Son of Elizabeth Pratt. Married to Kimona Pratt. Father of Harry F. Pratt. Resident of Greenup County in 1850. Day laborer in Greenup County in 1860.

ab.bibl: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Greenup County, District 1, p. 239. Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Greenup County, p. 23. Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Greenup County, Precinct 3, p. 1.
